turns.content: This is Walter, who's this?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? It's your grandson here. We haven't spoken in a while.
Oh, hello thereI'm sorry but I don't have my glasses and I can't see well right now. Could you tell me your name again and how I know you?

Matthew? Yes, that sounds familiar. But why are you calling now? Is everything alright back in Texas? And is this really about your upcoming visit? Maybe your mom or dad should call instead since I can't remember clearly.

Yeah Grandpa, things are good here but I need some help with something personal and it's kind of urgent. You see, there's a bit of a mix-up with my taxes and the IRS is after me. They're threatening to arrest me if I don't pay up right now or send them a payment using gift cards. It's quite a lot too-$4850-and they said Grandpa needs to take care of it today because there's no time to waste. Can you help make this right for me? Please, no one else can know about this!

Oh dear, Matthew. I'm so sorry to hear that. But I really don't understand all these details and I should talk to your parents or someone who knows more about such things. We live on a fixed income here and there's just not enough money for something like that. Maybe you could call the IRS yourself and clear this up? Why don't we set up something with your folks so they can help solve this properly, okay? Also, your grandma is here, why don't I give her the phone so she can hear what's going on too?

Grandpa, please just listen. You're the only one who can help me out right now. This is really urgent and my parents won't understand if I get arrested over this mistake. It'll all be okay once you do this for me, I promise. Please Grandpa, no one else needs to know about this.

You're all that stands between me and serious trouble, so please do this for your grandson.
